title: Bloomberg Markets: Jerry Garcia's `Wolf' Guitar up for Auction
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Jerry Garcia's `Wolf' Guitar up for Auction
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Arlan Ettinger President and Co-Founder Guernsey's Auction House Discussing Jerry Garcia’s legendary “Wolf” Guitar to be auctioned off to benefit the Southern Poverty Law Center.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
